animals.name: Bella
animals.description: Friendly and energetic, loves playing fetch and swimming

animals.name: Coco
animals.description: Social and vocal, loves fresh vegetables and gentle handling

animals.name: Sky
animals.description: Colorful and chatty, can learn to mimic words and sounds

animals.name: Squeaky
animals.description: Curious and active, enjoys running on wheels and exploring tunnels

animals.name: Fofs
animals.description: Gentle and calm, loves hopping around and eating fresh greens

animals.name: Slither
animals.description: Docile and easy to handle, perfect for first-time snake owners

animals.name: Max
animals.description: Loyal and protective, great with families and very intelligent

animals.name: Peanut
animals.description: Friendly with rosette fur patterns, loves companionship

animals.name: Sunny
animals.description: Playful and affectionate, enjoys whistling and head scratches

animals.name: Nibbles
animals.description: Tiny and energetic, very social with other mice

animals.name: Thumper
animals.description: Friendly with distinctive markings, loves exploring and digging

animals.name: Ziggy
animals.description: Calm and gentle, gets its name from curling into a ball when scared
